input.sentences: after graduation she took many pictures .
she took pictures with her family .
she took pictures with people she knew from school .
it was an exciting day for everyone involved .
output.sentences: Graduation was something she had worked toward for 4 years.
She was even given a medal for her hard work.
Her parents were very proud of her.
THey got to gether with the rest of their family at the ceremony.
They all applauded when she walked across the stage.
